# loko

> C4 model architecture documentation tool with native LLM integration via MCP. Design software architecture conversationally, render D2 diagrams, and generate beautiful documentation.

loko enables architects to design systems through conversation with AI assistants like Claude. It combines three core technologies: C4 model for architecture visualization, D2 for diagram rendering, and MCP for LLM tool integration.

- [D2 Diagramming Guide](https://github.com/madstone-tech/loko/blob/main/docs/llm/d2-syntax.md): D2 language syntax, styling, and patterns for architecture diagrams
- [MCP Tools Reference](https://github.com/madstone-tech/loko/blob/main/docs/llm/mcp-tools.md): Complete reference for all loko MCP tools with examples
